Interface ParameterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JooqParameterService

    public interface ParameterService
    Service for retrieving application parameters

    1.0
    Author:
    Joseph Kratz

      • getAllParameters

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllParameters()
                                                           throws ParameterException

        Returns:
        Map of parameters
        Throws:

      • getParameter

        java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String paramName,
                              java.lang.String defaultValue)
                       throws ParameterException
        Parameters:
        paramName - Name of the parameter
        defaultValue - Default value to be used if parameter is not found
        Returns:
        Parameter value as String
        Throws:
        ParameterException
